General.Name: Bank Uralsib OAO
General.Description: Public Joint Stock Company BANK URALSIB, together with its subsidiaries, provides a range of banking products and services to individuals and corporate clients in Russia and internationally. The company operates through Corporate Banking Operations, Retail Banking Operations, Small Business, Leasing Operations, Financial services and Markets, Treasury and Asset-Liability Management, and Corporate Investments and Other Operations segments. It offers commercial lending and deposit taking products, settlements and cash transactions, trade finance, and transactions with precious metals; and money transfer and foreign exchange services, and various banking card products. The company also provides a range of banking services for high net worth individuals, including their savings management and financial advisory. In addition, it is also involved in primary and secondary equity and debt capital markets activities; brokerage services and securities trading, including repurchase agreements and derivative transactions; and the placement and raising of funds. Further, the company invests in and rents retail trade premises, completed residential apartments, residential buildings under construction, and land; manages properties; and provides leasing and management services. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Moscow, Russia.
